## ðŸ’¼ Business News - 2025-11-14

### Top Stories

1. [Kim Kardashian's Skims hits $5B valuation milestone in massive new $225M funding round](https://www.foxbusiness.com/retail/kim-kardashians-skims-hits-5b-valuation-milestone-massive-new-225m-funding-round)

2. [Billion-dollar beverage company touts 'fun' new drink collaboration with young TikTok star](https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/billion-dollar-beverage-company-touts-fun-new-drink-collab-young-tiktok-star)

3. [Disney ditches 'diversity' and 'DEI' in business report for the first time since 2019](https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/disney-ditches-diversity-dei-business-report-first-time-since-2019)

4. [Home listings featuring water-saving fixtures surge nearly 290% as buyers prioritize conservation](https://www.foxbusiness.com/real-estate/home-listings-featuring-water-saving-fixtures-surge-nearly-290-buyers-prioritize-conservation)

5. [Russiaâ€™s first AI robot faceplants on stage in humiliating Moscow debut](https://www.foxbusiness.com/fox-news-tech/russias-first-ai-robot-faceplants-stage-humiliating-moscow-debut)

6. [National Debt Tracker: American taxpayers (you) are now on the hook for $38,121,217,149,187.64 as of 11/13/25](https://www.foxbusiness.com/economy/us-national-debt-tracker)

7. [LARRY KUDLOW: Growthier and money-er will solve affordability](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/larry-kudlow-growthier-money-er-solve-affordability)

8. [Disney CEO Bob Iger reacts to YouTube TV deal](https://www.foxbusiness.com/lifestyle/disney-ceo-bob-iger-reacts-youtube-tv-deal)

9. [Inside look at MP Materials amid the rare earth race](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/inside-look-mp-materials-amid-rare-earth-race)

10. [Target launches â€˜10-4â€™ training, encouraging workers to smile at customers](https://www.foxbusiness.com/retail/target-launches-10-4-training-encouraging-workers-smile-customers)

### Summary

Kim Kardashian's shapewear brand, Skims, has achieved a valuation of $5 billion after securing $225 million in new funding, highlighting the brand's rapid growth and market impact. Meanwhile, a billion-dollar beverage company is leveraging the influence of a young TikTok star to introduce a 'fun' new drink, underscoring the power of social media in modern product marketing. Disney has notably removed mentions of 'diversity' and 'DEI' from its business report for the first time in years, signaling a shift in corporate communication strategies. In the real estate sector, there's a significant rise in home listings featuring water-saving fixtures, reflecting growing consumer demand for environmental conservation. Lastly, Russia's unveiling of its first AI robot ended in embarrassment as it malfunctioned on stage, indicating the challenges and unpredictability in the development of AI technologies.

tech_news.markdown:
## ðŸ’» Tech News - 2025-11-14

### Top Stories

1. [Who Pays When A.I. Is Wrong?](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/11/12/business/media/ai-defamation-libel-slander.html)

2. [Vine reboot called Divine has launched](https://popculturenews.com/vine-is-back/)

3. [After years of saying no, Tesla reportedly adding Apple CarPlay to its cars](https://arstechnica.com/cars/2025/11/after-years-of-saying-no-tesla-reportedly-adding-apple-carplay-to-its-cars/)

4. [Why Hotel-Room Cancellations Disappeared](https://www.theatlantic.com/technology/2025/11/hotel-room-cancellation-policy/684917/)

5. [How to Get a North Korea / Antarctica VPS](https://blog.lyc8503.net/en/post/asn-5-worldwide-servers/)

6. [Postgres IPC:SyncRep â€“ Sync Replication Is Not Actually Sync Replication](https://ardentperf.com/2025/10/27/explaining-ipcsyncrep-postgres-sync-replication-is-not-actually-sync-replication/)

7. [Microsoft-backed Veir is bringing superconductors to data centers](https://techcrunch.com/2025/11/12/microsoft-backed-veir-targets-data-centers-for-its-megawatt-class-superconductors/)

8. [Tesla Is Working to Add Apple CarPlay in Bid to Boost Vehicle Sales](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2025-11-13/tesla-is-working-to-add-apple-carplay-in-bid-to-boost-vehicle-sales)

9. [Electric Vehicle Range Prediction Models: A Review](https://www.mdpi.com/2032-6653/16/11/607)

10. [Build apps with any modality input, reasoning, and any modality](https://github.com/8090-inc/xrx-core)

### Summary

1. The article explores the complexities and accountability issues surrounding errors made by artificial intelligence, questioning who is financially and ethically responsible when AI systems fail or cause harm.
2. Divine, a new platform aiming to revive the spirit of the once-popular short-form video app Vine, has officially been launched, marking a significant moment for fans of the original service.
3. Tesla is reportedly planning to integrate Apple CarPlay into its vehicles, a notable shift after years of resistance from the electric car maker, enhancing the in-car experience for iPhone users.
4. The disappearance of hotel-room cancellations as a flexible option for travelers is examined, highlighting the changing policies and economic factors influencing the hospitality industry's approach towards booking flexibility.
5. The article provides guidance on acquiring Virtual Private Server (VPS) hosting in the unique and politically complex locations of North Korea and Antarctica, touching on the technical and regulatory challenges involved.
